## To rebuild the package using devtools:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
devtools::build_vignettes()
devtools::build(binary = TRUE)
devtools::build(binary = FALSE)
devtools::install()
```

## Install behind IZW proxy

```{r, eval = FALSE}
httr::with_config(httr::use_proxy("192.168.2.2:3128"), devtools::install_github("courtiol/LM2GLMM", build_vignettes = TRUE))
```
